'''LEGO Minecraft Dragon Slayer''' is a [[skin pack]] that consists of the "Dragon Slayer" skin from the ''[[LEGO Minecraft]]'' set "The End Battle". It is available by redeeming a promo code printed on one of the ''LEGO'' bricks included in the ''LEGO'' set.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.lego.com/cdn/product-assets/product.bi.core.pdf/6267903.pdf#page=69|title=Building instructions for 21151, The End Battle, LEGO® MINECRAFT|website=LEGO.com}}</ref> The in-game name for this skin pack is "LEGO(R) Minecraft(TM) Dragon Slayer".
